Title: Il caso Moro
Writer: Robert Katz (book), Armenia Balducci (screenplay), Robert Katz (screenplay), Giuseppe Ferrara (screenplay), Leonardo Sciascia (book)
Actors: Gian Maria Volontè, Mattia Sbragia, Bruno Zanin, Consuelo Ferrara
Plot: On March 16 1978, the Red Brigade kidnap the Chief of the Christian Democraty, the party in power in Italy since the end of the war. fifty-five days later, his corpse was found in the trunk...
